channel.title: Kiwi IAM documentation
channel.description: Recent content on Kiwi IAM documentation

item.title: Kiwi IAM
item.description: Kiwi IAM Kiwi IAM is a RBAC (Role based access control) app made for the needs of Kiwi. The aim is to simplify securing apps by providing all the relevant libraries and infrastructure. Features: Serving a permission list of the user Caching Okta provider (Okta has a rate limit of 600 req/s) Serving Okta user profile for apps that need to use user data API service API service is responsible for handling communication with Okta.
